column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A Korean man arrested by the Royal Gendarmerie of Phnom Penh Municipal Court yesterday was sent to jail on the afternoon of May 20
column5: on charges of fraud.------Korean man YANG JONG KUN
column8: Khan Por Senchey.------Phnom Penh Municipal Court Judge sentenced YANG JONG KUN  to two years in prison and fined him 4 million riels on charges of “fraud”
column9: according to a warrant. The offences took place in Phnom Penh from 2010 to 2016
column10: and he was charged under Article 626 and Article 627 of the Penal Code.------RASMEI
